item.title: Alucinara
item.description: Overview Alucinara is a form of energy that pertains to the transfer of matter, thought, and other forms of energy between two or more realms.

item.title: darkness
item.description: Overview Darkness is the physical manifestation of thought, allowing it to exist within the corporeal realms and outside of the dreamscape.

item.title: The Dreamscape
item.description: Overview The dreamscape is the only incorporeal realm. It is where matter, thought, and energy is stored without form, and can be retrieved through the use of alucinara to convert such things into physical form, within any of the corporeal realms.

item.title: The Petrified Child
item.description: Overview The Petrified Child is a semi-corporeal deity which is worshipped in many monotheistic and polytheistic religions, and can reside within both the corporeal realms and the dreamscape.
